original_text: If people always say good things about you now, it will be very bad for you. Their ancestors also said good things about the false prophets long ago.’
korean_text: 모든 사람이 너희를 칭찬하면 화가 있도다 그들의 조상들이 거짓 선지자들에게 이와 같이 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: If people always say good things about you now
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 사람들이 지금 항상 너에 대해 좋은 말을 한다면

sentences.original_text: it will be very bad for you
Their ancestors also said good things
about the false prophets long ago
